Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Kimball
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to a stalled train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to a stalled train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
